titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the recapture rule of the first-time homebuyer credit and to extend the application of the credit through 2009.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the recapture rule of the first-time homebuyer credit and to extend the application of the credit through 2009.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the 15-year repayment requirement under the first-time homebuyer tax credit and to extend the termination date of such credit until December 31, 2009.
